content: My test FHIR Servers previously running at fhir2.healthintersections.com.au and fhir3.healthintersections.com.au are now located at test.fhir.org/r2 and test.fhir.org/r3

test.fhir.org/r3 says that it is running FHIR 3.0.0, should that be 3.0.1?
FHIR Â© HL7.org | Server Home | Health Intersections FHIR Server v1.0.136 | FHIR Version 3.0.0 | User: ANONYMOUS (203.94.186.202)
yes. I haven't updated it for 3.0.1 yet - hopefully today
@James Agnew, when you have a minute, can you update the fhirtest.uhn.ca server to allow you to point to the new servers rather than the old healthintersections ones?
